H0.text: Hydrogen bonds hold together adenine and thymine.

H1.text: Covalent bonds are the forces that hold together adenine and thymine.

H2.text: Potassium bonds hold together adenine and thymine.

H3.text: Helium bonds hold together adenine and thymine.

A4.text: Adenine bonding only to thymine in two hydrogen bonds

A5.text: The nucleotides are joined to one another in a chain by covalent bonds
